result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mickey J Johnson

records.addlTxt: Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of $2500.00

9:05 AM Defendant Mickey J Johnson not in court.  Attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez in court for Mickey J Johnson.  Prosecuting attorney Randy P. Sitzberger in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Victim rights have been complied with by the Waukesha County District Attorneys Office. 
Atty Gutierrez did speak with client a few days ago and stated he could appear by zoom but would log on for today's hearing.
Defendant did not appear via zoom today. 
Court revokes and forfeits bail, issues capias.

9:12 AM Defendant Mickey J Johnson not in court.  Attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez in court for Mickey J Johnson.  Prosecuting attorney Charles Patrick Hoffmann in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Victim rights have been complied with by the Waukesha County District Attorneys Office. 
Atty Gutierrez is unsure where his client is. 
State requests capias. 
Court will stay a capias until the next hearing date.
Hearing scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Luis Gutierrez has been appointed to represent the defendant.
To Seal Victim/Witness Identification Key signed by Judge Bugenhagen Jr. on June 30, 2022.

Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.  Defendant to have no contact with Victim A/Witness A listed in the Criminal Complaint/Victim Identification Key.  Defendant is not to share, reproduce or distribute any personal and/or identifying information about the crime victim(s), except to their attorney.

01:05 PM Defendant Mickey J Johnson in court, in custody, with attorney Luis Daniel Gutierrez.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern Julian Marrufo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed.  Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint.  Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
